title: I have a 0/11 Aurelion Sol
body: He's dragon down the whole team.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=EkyonKun,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=W42oHFgG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-19T08:18:34.486+0000)
>
> booooooooooooooooooooooooooop get off the stage.

Is how I thought it was gonna be
Too bad this champion became useless this season, RIP SOL ;(.

he just has a bad time now bec we have somthing like assassin/oneshot meta. 
but if u change your playstyle a little bit and dont pick him in these^^ kind of games, hes still fine :)
(thats what i found out)

I used to main Auralion but he is so garbage right now... only really plays well in really high elo because ppl like to farm in lower elo, Honestly I would give up Q movement speed if I can detonate it  on command and I would give up E distance if I can just use it without resetting, Why does a champion have so many weaknesses it feels god awful, its not "HIGH SKILL CAP" its artificial inflation, Q - cannot detonate *Anivia Laughs* - W - so weak now early game literally can boop some one 8-12 times early game and they perfectly fine - E - resets on every auto from any source - W - goes on massive cooldown from any form of CC - R decent really high cooldown -------- itemization needs to be backward retarded to cover some of the many weakness the champion has.. I love how he looks and feels but Auralion needs a buff honestly. Or anyone below platinum will never play him.
kind of expected when every champion counters him lol
it's so bad that I like it
Stuff happens, especially when ur trying new champion.{{champion:136}}
This is literally Aurelion Sol free week in ARAM. He's in the game every 2-3 games, and no one knows how to play him.
Sol... I did play him to a decent level in this pre season.
